name: Nzaro

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  A website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: Plugin & Theme Development
services.description: I make custom plugins and themes for your needs

aboutpara: Web developer from Nairobi Kenya transitioning to software Engineering. I work with PHP and Javascript and I'm good with WordPress. I am currently mastering Laravel and MERN

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a web developer,rookie software engineer,
resume.description: I have delivered user experiences to thousands of people. Well-versed with Wordpress, Laravel, React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Overseeing maintaining websites and web applications, Setting up emails for the company and clients, Handling front-end design for projects. , Gathering user interface and user experience research data. , Collaborate with other teams for projects. , Translation of mock-ups and wireframes into readable code. ,  Integration of front end with back end code. , Troubleshooting website and application-related problems. , Transforming non-responsive sites to adapt to various devices and accessibility compliance. , Handling website migrations to client infrastructure. , API integrations to existing client systems, such as Odoo, Microsoft Dynamics and internal ERPs/HRMs. , Website cleanup and updates for hacked and out-of-date websites.,  Creating backend applications for data collection. , Creating campaign landing pages. ,  Troubleshooting email deliverability issues inside the company and for clients. , Managing companies' computing infrastructure and systems. , Advising clients on security practices post-go-live. , Hardening websites and web applications.,  Formulating and implementing the security policy for the company, Performing pen tests and vulnerability assessments for clients on retainer.
